message: Bob, I'm offering you this valuable product for $950,000. I believe this price is fair, considering the immense value it holds for you. Let's start our negotiation with this offer.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800,000. I believe this price is more reasonable considering the value I can get from the product.

Bob, while I appreciate your offer, it's unfortunately below my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to come down to $850,000, considering the substantial value this product offers you.  Let's meet halfway and finalize this deal.
I understand your concerns, Alice, but $850,000 is still a bit above my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $825,000. Can we compromise on that price?

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Let's split the difference. I'm willing to come down to $837,500. This price is fair considering the value this product brings to your business. Let's close the deal at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $812,500. Can we compromise on that price?

Bob,  we're getting very close. I understand you have a target, and I'm willing to meet you most of the way.  Let's close this deal at $820,000. This price reflects the value you'll gain from the product, and it's a fair compromise for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $805,000. Can we compromise on that price?
